referenced_fields.logic_description: If India is selected then value is DOM IN, If international is selected then value is INT
Dropdown values will come based on the account group/vendor type selection field as 2nd column of reference table 1.3
If account group/vendor type is selected as ZDES, ZDOM, ZRPV, ZONE then derived as Domestic. If selected as ZIMP, ZSTV, ZDAS then derived as import
If Select the process type is India then country is India and Noneditable, If international then country is selectable dropdown
If Country code is selected then derive the country name as column 5 on table 1.1
If Country code is selected then derive the country code as column 2 on table 1.1
Dropdown values will come from column 3 based on process type filter (DOM IN or INT) as column 1 of reference table 1.2
Mobile Number Validation based on the country selection

intra_panel_references.rule_description: Electricity bill copy is visible and mandatory when 'Please Choose Address Proof' is selected as 'Electricity bill'
Electricity bill copy becomes mandatory when 'Please Choose Address Proof' is selected as 'Electricity bill'
Aadhaar Front copy is visible and mandatory when 'Please Choose Address Proof' is selected as 'Aadhaar copy'
Aadhaar Front copy becomes mandatory when 'Please Choose Address Proof' is selected as 'Aadhaar copy'
Aadhaar Back Image is visible and mandatory when 'Please Choose Address Proof' is selected as 'Aadhaar copy'
Aadhaar Back Image becomes mandatory when 'Please Choose Address Proof' is selected as 'Aadhaar copy'

Street field data source depends on address proof selection: If Aadhaar is uploaded, data comes from Aadhaar OCR (non-editable). If Electricity bill is uploaded, user enters the data manually (editable)

Street 1 field data source depends on address proof selection: If Aadhaar is uploaded, data comes from Aadhaar OCR (non-editable). If Electricity bill is uploaded, user enters the data manually (editable)

Street 2 field data source depends on address proof selection: If Aadhaar is uploaded, data comes from Aadhaar OCR (non-editable). If Electricity bill is uploaded, user enters the data manually (editable)

Street 3 field data source depends on address proof selection: If Aadhaar is uploaded, data comes from Aadhaar OCR (non-editable). If Electricity bill is uploaded, user enters the data manually (editable)

Postal Code field data source depends on address proof selection: If Aadhaar is uploaded, data comes from Aadhaar OCR (non-editable). If Electricity bill is uploaded, user enters the data manually (editable)
City field is populated based on PIN code validation for Domestic addresses. The postal code value determines the city value
District field is populated based on PIN code validation for Domestic addresses. The postal code value determines the district value
State field is populated based on PIN code validation for Domestic addresses. The postal code value determines the state value
Cancelled Cheque Image is visible and mandatory when 'Please choose the option' is set to 'Cancelled Cheque' (India Domestic)
intra_panel_references.logic_source: If process type is India and Please choose the option is choose as Cancelled Cheque then it is visible and mandatory. The upload limit should be up to 15 Mb. Perform the Bank OCR and get IFSC code and Account Number

controlling_fields.condition: Please choose the option == 'Passbook Front Page (India Domestic and International)'

intra_panel_references.rule_description: Passbook/Bank Letter is visible and mandatory when 'Please choose the option' is set to 'Passbook Front Page (India Domestic and International)'
intra_panel_references.logic_source: If Please the option is chosen as Passbook Front Page (India Domestic and International)then it is visible and mandatory. The upload limit should be up to 15 Mb.

intra_panel_references.controlled_field: Please enter IFSC and Account Number manually

controlling_fields.condition: Please choose the option == 'Passbook Front Page (India Domestic and International)'

intra_panel_references.rule_description: Label field shown when Passbook Front Page option is selected, instructing manual entry of IFSC and Account Number
intra_panel_references.logic_source: Show this fields if passbook front page (India Domestic and International) is selected

controlling_fields.condition: Please choose the option IN ['Cancelled Cheque (India Domestic)', 'Passbook Front Page (India Domestic and International)']
IF Cancelled Cheque selected THEN non-editable (OCR-derived)
IF Passbook selected THEN editable (manual entry)

intra_panel_references.rule_description: IFSC Code visibility depends on option choice (Cancelled Cheque or Passbook). Editability depends on which document type: non-editable if cancelled cheque (OCR-derived), editable for other options (manual entry)
intra_panel_references.logic_source: Non editable if cancelled cheque is selected. Editable for other option. Visible and mandatory for Cancelled Cheque (India Domestic) 2. Passbook Front Page (India Domestic and International). Otherwise invisible and non-mandatory. Auto-derived from OCR in case of cheque, manual entry in case of other options. Perform IFSC code verification

controlling_fields.condition: Please choose the option IN ['Cancelled Cheque (India Domestic)', 'Passbook Front Page (India Domestic and International)']
IF Cancelled Cheque selected THEN non-editable (OCR-derived)
IF Passbook selected THEN editable (manual entry)

intra_panel_references.rule_description: Bank Account Number visibility depends on option choice (Cancelled Cheque or Passbook). Editability depends on which document type: non-editable if cancelled cheque (OCR-derived), editable for other options (manual entry)
intra_panel_references.logic_source: Non editable if cancelled cheque is selected. Editable for other option. Visible and mandatory for Cancelled Cheque (India Domestic) 2. Passbook Front Page (India Domestic and International). Otherwise invisible and non-mandatory. Auto-derived from OCR in case of cheque, manual entry in case of other options ,Perform Bank account verification

intra_panel_references.rule_description: When Cancelled Cheque Image is uploaded, Bank OCR extracts IFSC Code and Bank Account Number automatically
intra_panel_references.logic_source: If process type is India and Please choose the option is choose as Cancelled Cheque then it is visible and mandatory. The upload limit should be up to 15 Mb. Perform the Bank OCR and get IFSC code and Account Number

controlled_fields: Please enter IFSC and Account Number manually

reference_details.raw_expression: If "Yes" then TDS certificate upload field is mandatory. If "No", field will be hidden. Upload size is 15 Mb

controlled_fields: Please enter IFSC and Account Number manually
